title-group.article-title: Orthogonal Spline Collocation Laplace-Modified and Alternating-Direction Methods for Parabolic Problems on Rectangles

abstract.p: A complete stability and convergence analysis is given for two- and three-level, piecewise Hermite bicubic orthogonal spline collocation, Laplace-modified and alternating-direction schemes for the approximate solution of linear parabolic problems on rectangles. It is shown that the schemes are unconditionally stable and of optimal-order accuracy in space and time.
